detectors.description:
LynxFinanceStake.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#709-724) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#715)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#718)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LynxFinanceStake.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#695-698):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#696)
		- bpt.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#619)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#550)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#697)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#550)
		- yfi.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#704)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#697)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#645)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#697)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#644)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#697)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#703)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#647)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#697)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LynxFinanceStake.sol#648)
